Mo Williams

Maurice Williams

(The Hitman)

Position: Point Guard and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-1, 198lb (185cm, 89kg)

Born: December 19, 1982 in Jackson, Mississippi us

College: Alabama

High School: Murrah in Jackson, Mississippi

Recruiting Rank: 2001 (16)

Draft: Utah Jazz, 2nd round (18th pick, 47th overall), 2003 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 1, 2003

Career Length: 13 years

How old is Mo Williams?

Mo Williams is 42 years old.

Mo Williams was born in Jackson, Mississippi.

Mo Williams was born on December 19, 1982.

Mo Williams is 6-1 (185 cm) tall.

Mo Williams weighed 198 lbs (89 kg) when playing.

Mo Williams is not in the Hall of Fame.

Mo Williams was drafted by Utah Jazz, 2nd round (18th pick, 47th overall), 2003 NBA Draft.

Point Guard and Shooting Guard.

Mo Williams last played in 2016.

Mo Williams made at least $67,611,931 playing professional basketball.

Mo Williams made $9,300,000 in 2011.

Mo Williams won one championship.
